SEARCH
Package Entities

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Entities.Hero
Direct Known Subclasses:
Intern, Receptionist, SalesRepresentative
public abstract class Hero extends Entity
Represents a generic playable character, extending the Entity class. This class serves as a base for specific hero types, with the attributes maxHp, level, mainWeapon, and inventory of items. It utilizes a Random object for its methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero(String name, int hp, int strength, int gold, Weapon mainWeapon, ArrayList<Consumable> inventory)
      Constructs a Hero instance with the specified attributes. A Random object is also instantiated for use in various methods.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Hero.
      hp - The amount of health points the Hero has. It always starts equals to the maxHp.
      strength - The strength value of the Hero, used during attacks.
      gold - The amount of money the Hero has, used to obtain items during the game.
      mainWeapon - The weapon that the hero starts the game.
      inventory - An ArrayList of items that the hero have available to use during the game. During construction, it is initialized a object of Random to be used in class methods

  • Method Details

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()

    • setMainWeapon

      public void setMainWeapon(Weapon mainWeapon)
      Replace the Hero's mainWeapon
      Parameters:
      mainWeapon - the new Weapon to be used by the Hero

    • payForAItem

      public boolean payForAItem(int itemPrice)
      Decrease the amount of gold correspondent to the specified itemPrice if Hero can support it. Ensures the price is non-negative.
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - the amount of gold to be decreased. Must be non-negative.
      Returns:
      true, if the itemPrice is non-negative and the hero had gold enough to support the item false, if the itemPrice is negative or the hero has less gold than the item itemPrice

    • addConsumableToInventory

      public void addConsumableToInventory(Consumable consumable)
      Adds the specified Consumable item to the hero's inventory.
      Parameters:
      consumable - Consumable item to be added to Hero's inventory

    • showDetails

      public void showDetails()
      Print to the console detailed information about the hero, including maximum health, level, main weapon details, and inventory contents. The showDetails method is extended from the Entity class.
      Overrides:
      showDetails in class Entity

    • checkPotionAvailability

      public boolean checkPotionAvailability()
      Checks if there is at least one Potion item in the hero's inventory.
      Returns:
      true, if exists at least one Potion in Hero inventory, false, ir doesn't exist any Potion in Hero inventory,

    • offerPotionsIfAvailable

      public void offerPotionsIfAvailable()
      Allows the player to use available potions from the Hero's inventory. The player is presented with a list of potions and can choose one to consume. If the Hero's HP exceeds the max HP after using a potion, the player is warned and given the option to proceed or cancel. The process continues until the player chooses to stop or the potions had ended.

    • upgradeLevel

      public void upgradeLevel(Npc enemy)
      Increases the hero's level by 1, maximum and current health by 10, strength by 1, and adds the enemy's gold to the hero's total.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy combated to Hero upgrade a level

    • incrementStrength

      public void incrementStrength(int strengthIncrement)
      Increases the hero's strength by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      strengthIncrement - the strength amount to be added

    • decreaseStrength

      public void decreaseStrength(int strengthDecrement)
      Reduces the hero's strength by the specified amount, ensuring the strength does not drop below 1.
      Parameters:
      strengthDecrement - the strength amount to be decreased

    • incrementHp

      public void incrementHp(int hp)
      Increases the hero's health by the specified amount, ensuring it does not exceed the maximum health (maxHp).
      Parameters:
      hp - the amount of hp to be added

    • getEnemyAttackMessage

      public String getEnemyAttackMessage()
      Returns a message to be displayed after a successful enemy attack.
      Returns:
      a random message from de option List.

    • heroAttack

      protected int heroAttack(Npc enemy, boolean specialAttackAvailable)
      Provides options for the player to attack the enemy. Depending on the player's choice, the enemy's health is reduced based on the attack's strength. The specialAttack option can only be used once per confrontation.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to have its hp decreased
      specialAttackAvailable - boolean determining is specialAttack is still available to use
      Returns:
      the number corresponded to the attack used

    • enemyAttack

      protected boolean enemyAttack(Npc enemy, double enemyStrengthAdjust)
      Reduces the hero's health based on the enemy's strength and an adjustment factor.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy that is attacking the Hero
      enemyStrengthAdjust - a tax to minor ou manor the enemy strength
      Returns:
      true if the Hero hp is greater than 0 after decrease, false if the Hero hp after decrease is zero.

    • attack

      public abstract boolean attack(Npc enemy)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to handle the hero's attack strategy during combat.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy that the hero will fight against.
      Returns:
      true if the hero completes the attack with HP greater than 0; false otherwise.
